title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 80-6.9 - Acceptable continuing teacher and leader education
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 80-6.9 - Acceptable continuing teacher and leader education

State Regulations
(a) Acceptable CTLE must be taken from a
sponsor approved by the department pursuant to section
80-6.10
of this Subpart. (b) Acceptable CTLE shall be study in the
content area of any certificate title held by the individual or in pedagogy, and include any required study in language acquisition addressing the needs of

English language learners as described in section
80-6.3
of this Subpart. Acceptable
CTLE must be conducted through activities designed to improve the teacher or
leader's pedagogical and/or leadership skills, targeted at improving student
performance, including but not limited to formal CTLE activities. Such
activities also shall promote the professionalization of teaching and
educational leadership, as applicable, and be closely aligned to district goals
for student performance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
80-6.9

Adopted

New

York State Register June 29, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 26, eff. 6/29/2016

Amended

New

York State Register December 24, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 52, eff. 12/24/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
